name: Adventure Collection backpack, olive, 20 l
description: The high-quality Adventure Collection backpack made of robust nylon fabric is the perfect size for day trips and the daily commute. It combines a simple design with a multitude of functions. Rain showers are no problem thanks to its waterproof main compartment with an integrated laptop sleeve (up to 15”).

name: Adventure Collection tank bag, large
description: The large Adventure Collection tank bag is made from hard-wearing nylon fabric and is ideal for longer trips. It’s volume can be extended from 11 to 16 litres and is suitable for steeply sloping tank shapes. The practical features include the waterproof main compartment with inner bag, the cable duct and the carry handle.

name: Adventure Collection tank bag, small
description: The small Adventure Collection tank bag made of robust nylon fabric with a volume of 5 litres is the ideal companion for short trips. Waterproof main compartment with inner bag, cable duct and carry handle are practical features that leave nothing to be desired.

name: Aluminium case carry handle
description: The practical carry handle makes carrying the aluminium case and small, aluminium topcase extra convenient. It can be easily attached to the lashing hooks on the lid and can be used itself to attach further items of luggage when on the go.

name: Aluminium case liners
description: The waterproof liners make transporting luggage with the aluminium cases even easier and more secure. Their extra-wide opening allows for easier packing, and the carry handle and shoulder strap allow you to transport luggage items conveniently, even outside of the case.

name: Aluminium topcase, black, 37 l, electrified
description: The topcase made of black anodised aluminium is a loyal companion on tours. With its 37 litres of volume, it boasts enough space for smaller luggage or a helmet. Besides useful lighting, it also includes a USB-C charging port, for instance for smartphones or tablets.

name: Aluminium topcase, silver, 37 l, electrified
description: The aluminium topcase is a loyal companion on tours. With its 37 litres of volume, it boasts enough space for smaller luggage or a helmet. Besides useful lighting, it also includes a USB-C charging port, for instance for smartphones or tablets.

name: Bag for luggage grid
description: The bag for the luggage grid has a waterproof main compartment and, with a volume of 4.5 litres, provides enough storage space for day trips or the daily ride to work. It is a practical addition or alternative to the tank bag. The zip fastener on three sides allows quick access, while the carry handle facilitates transport.

name: Black aluminium cases, 36.5 l + 37 l, electrified
description: The sturdy cases made of black anodised aluminium boast over 73 litres of space. Practical details such as an integrated USB-C charging port, a load capacity of up to 10 kg per side and enough space for a helmet make them particularly ideal for long trips.

name: Black backrest pad for Vario topcase
description: The black backrest pad for the Vario topcase increases pillion comfort, especially on longer tours. The foam pad is easy to install and fits perfectly on the accompanying topcase.

name: Black Collection rear bag, large
description: The Black Collection rear bag offers intelligent details such as a waterproof, removable liner and variable shoulder straps with the option of carrying it as a backpack. The storage space can be expanded from 50 to 60 litres and makes the bag, which folds down to a compact size on the stable base and ideal companion for touring riders.

name: Black Collection rear bag, small
description: The Black Collection rear bag offers intelligent details such as a waterproof, removable liner and variable shoulder straps with the option of carrying it as a backpack. The storage space can be expanded from 35 to 42 litres and makes the bag, which folds down to a compact size on the stable base, the ideal companion for shorter tours.

name: Black Collection tank bag, large
description: The large Black Collection tank bag made of durable TPU-coated PES with a waterproof, removable liner and belt attachment offers intelligent details such as the cable duct or the waterproof, touchable transparent compartment. The storage space can be expanded from 11 to 16 litres. Extra space is available with the exterior pocket.

name: Black Collection tank bag, small
description: The small, durable Black Collection tank bag with belt attachment is the ideal companion for a short trip. The main compartment with removable waterproof liner, the cable duct, the storage space volume of 5. litres, the carry handle and the removable shoulder strap are handy qualities that leave almost nothing to be desired.

name: Case holder for aluminium case, black
description: The black case holders allow for easy and secure installation of the aluminium case. A magnetic coupling serves as the electrical interface for the USB charging interface in the left-hand case.

name: Large Adventure Collection rear bag
description: The large Adventure Collection rear bag made of durable nylon fabric can be expanded from 50 to 60 litres – ideal for longer trips. It can be mounted on the luggage carrier or passenger seat with retaining straps. The rear bag can also be used as a backpack or shoulder bag. Space-saving storage when not in use.

name: Liner for aluminium topcase
description: The waterproof liner makes transporting luggage with the small, aluminium topcase even easier and more secure. Thanks to its extra-wide opening, it’s easy to pack, and its carry handle and shoulder strap allow luggage items to be conveniently transported even outside of the topcase.

name: Liner for Vario case
description: The made-to-measure liner for the Vario case wins users over with its robust material and a reinforced base panel. Includes a main pocket and a smaller additional pocket. This is the ideal way to use up the space in the case. The left main pocket has a padded compartment for a smartphone or tablet.

name: Liner for Vario topcase
description: The precisely fitting liner for the Vario topcase is particularly easy to load thanks to the robust material and the stiffened luggage compartment removable panel. It features a zip fastener that allows you to expand the volume of the bag made of robust materials. Practical details such as carrying handles, a mesh partition and a compartment in the lid allow for versatile use.

name: Luggage plate
description: Luggage can be securely lashed to the luggage plate made of impact-resistant plastic. The plate uses the connection of the pillion seat and is easy to attach. Combined with the Vario cases, this creates a wide, flat loading surface. The payload is 5 kg, and with luggage attached to the side, 20 kg can be added.

name: Luggage roll 40 l
description: The robust luggage roll 40 is the ideal companion for off-road and on-road tours. With a volume of 40 litres, it offers sufficient space for luggage. Its durable and waterproof material reliably protects your luggage from moisture and dirt. Thanks to the sophisticated fastening straps, the roll can be quickly and easily attached to the motorbike.

name: Luggage roll 60 l
description: The robust luggage roll 60 is the ideal companion for off-road and on-road tours. With a volume of 60 litres, it offers enough space for longer trips. Its durable and waterproof material reliably protects your luggage from moisture and dirt. Thanks to the sophisticated fastening straps, the roll can be quickly and easily attached to the motorbike.

name: Luggage roll transport net
description: The transport net is the ideal addition to the luggage roll 60. It expands the storage space and offers a simple, quick and secure attachment for additional luggage. It can be attached quickly and easily thanks to the carabiners provided and also holds a wet ProRain overall securely in place, for example.

name: Silver aluminium cases, 36.5 l + 37 l, electrified
description: The sturdy aluminium cases boast 73 litres of space. Practical details such as an integrated USB-C charging port, a load capacity of up to 10 kg per side and enough space for a helmet make them particularly ideal for long trips.

name: Small Adventure Collection rear bag
description: The small Adventure Collection rear bag made of durable nylon fabric can be expanded from 37 to 42 litres – ideal for shorter trips. It can be mounted on the luggage carrier or passenger seat with retaining straps. The rear bag can also be used as a backpack or shoulder bag. Space-saving storage when not in use.

name: Soulfuel Collection rear bag, green, large, 50–60 l
description: The large rear bag of the Soulfuel Collection made from recycled polyester and leather is ideal for longer trips. Depending on the bike model, it can be mounted on the luggage carrier or passenger seat. Practical features, like a compartment for wet laundry or shoes and rucksack-carrying function, make it a versatile companion.

name: Soulfuel Collection rear bag, green, small, 35–42 l
description: The small rear bag of the Soulfuel Collection made from recycled polyester and leather is ideal for weekend trips. Depending on the bike model, it can be mounted on the luggage carrier or passenger seat. Practical features, like a compartment for wet laundry or shoes and rucksack-carrying function, make it a versatile companion.

name: Soulfuel Collection rucksack, green, 20 l
description: Made from recycled polyester and leather, the Soulfuel Collection rucksack is the perfect size for commuting to work or day trips. Laptops up to 15" in size can find space in the waterproof main compartment with roll closure. Two outer pockets provide quick access to personal items.

name: Soulfuel Collection tank bag, green, black, 11–16 l
description: The large tank bag from the Soulfuel Collection is made from recycled polyester and leather. It can be expanded from 11 to 16 litres. Useful features include the cable port, the waterproof main compartment with liner, the waterproof transparent compartment and the lid pocket for items that need to be quickly at hand.

name: Soulfuel Collection tank bag, green, small, 5 l
description: The small waterproof tank bag from the Soulfuel Collection is made from recycled polyester and leather and, with a volume of 5 litres, is the perfect companion for a short trip. Useful features include the cable port, the waterproof main compartment with liner and the lid pocket for items that need to be quickly at hand.

name: Urban Collection backpack, white, 20 l
description: The Urban Collection backpack is the ideal companion for a day trip or the commute to work, featuring a range of practical functions. The waterproof main compartment with rolltop closure includes a laptop section (up to 15”). Two outer pockets provide practical storage for items that need to be easily accessible.

name: Urban Collection rear bag, large
description: The large Urban Collection rear bag looks just as stylish off the bike. Thanks to a generous opening there is room for a helmet in the main compartment. The bag can be secured to the vehicle using the adjustable retaining straps with buckles. Particularly practical: the zip for expanding the volume to 60 litres.

name: Urban Collection rear bag, small
description: The small Urban Collection rear bag looks just as stylish off the bike. Thanks to a generous opening there is room for a helmet in the main compartment. The bag can be secured to the vehicle using the adjustable retaining straps with buckles. Particularly practical: the zip for expanding the volume to 42 litres.

name: Urban Collection tank bag, large
description: The Urban Collection tank bag large for motorbikes with steeply sloping tank shapes impresses with its simple design and numerous functions. Thanks to the anti-slip foam padding on the underside and the strap attachment, the tank bag can be fastened easily and securely. Plug fasteners at the front and rear make refuelling easier.

name: Urban Collection tank bag, small
description: The small Urban Collection tank bag impresses with its simple design and numerous functions. Thanks to the anti-slip foam padding on the underside and the strap attachment, the tank bag can be fastened easily and securely. Plug fasteners at the front and rear make refuelling easier.

name: Vario case, black, 25-32 l + 24-30 l
description: Available from 2025. The black Vario cases for both sides impress with electrical functions such as central locking and interior lighting. There is also a USB charging port in the left case. The steplessly adjustable volume is 24 to 30 litres on the right and 25 to 32 litres on the left.

name: Vario topcase 28-36 l
description: With its 28–36 litres of space, the Vario topcase impresses with electrical functions such as central locking, light and USB charging port. The volume can be adjusted steplessly in just a few steps using a rotary wheel. The topcase is waterproof in connection with the optional inner pocket. The anodised aluminium covers are a real eye-catcher.

name: Enduro foot pegs
description: The Enduro foot pegs have a wider and longer tread area and therefore offer more support and a non-slip footing. This enables better vehicle control off-road and when riding in a standing position without restricting the operability of the gearshift and footbrake lever.

name: Low Sport windscreen, tinted
description: The low, tinted windscreen enhances the sporty Enduro look and provides a clear view, especially when riding standing up. Thanks to developments in the BMW wind tunnel, it also improves aerodynamic efficiency in comparison with the high windscreen. A special coating also reduces its susceptibility to scratches.

name: Low Sport windscreen, tinted
description: The low, tinted windscreen with ACC cut-out section emphasises the sporty Enduro look and provides a clear view, especially when riding standing up. Thanks to developments in the BMW wind tunnel, it also improves aerodynamic efficiency in comparison with the high windscreen. A special coating also reduces its susceptibility to scratches.

name: Windscreen tinted
description: The tinted windscreen emphasises the machine's sporty look. It combines excellent aerodynamics with excellent protection from wind and weather. The scratch-resistant coating on both sides increases durability. The "ACC" lettering rounds off the individual appearance.

name: BMW Motorrad dual USB charger with 60 cm cable
description: Using the BMW Motorrad dual USB charger with a 60 cm long cable, two mobile devices can be charged simultaneously whilst riding. The charging technology supports Quick Charge 3.0, Samsung AFC and Apple Quick Charge. Smartphones can be charged even faster this way. The charger is connected to the 12V on-board power socket via a cable.

name: ConnectedRide navigator
description: You’ll have all your trips and plans to hand with the BMW ConnectedRide navigator. Use your BMW ID to synchronise your planned routes and notes with the BMW Motorrad app. The 5.5-inch touch display can also be read with ease in direct sunlight. Intuitive to operate using the Multi-controller.

name: ConnectedRide navigator protective glass
description: The protective glass reliably protects the 5.5-inch navigation display from dirt, flying stones and damage. The hardened glass has an anti-glare and anti-reflective surface, so that the TFT display can be read easily. With BMW emblem.

name: ConnectedRide Smartphone Cradle
description: The ConnectedRide Cradle serves as a holder to use the smartphone as a navigation device while riding. The BMW Motorrad Connected app allows the navigation map and vehicle data to be accessed in the field of view via the Multi-Controller. The holder allows for different smartphone sizes and charges the smartphone inductively or wired.

name: Extra socket
description: Electronic devices can be connected to the bike’s electrical system via the additional 12V power socket. Your devices can now be operated or charged during long journeys.

name: Black, rear angular gearbox protection
description: The protective cover for the rear angular gearbox protects this exposed area from damage. Not only is the cover sturdy – it’s also extra leightweight. Its high-quality workmanship and BMW Motorrad inscription also definitely make it a real eye-catcher.

name: Carbon cylinder guard
description: The high-quality carbon cylinder guard combines an eye-catching look with excellent functionality. The hand-laminated forged carbon is particularly robust and UV-resistant. The cylinder guard is a weight-saving alternative to the stainless-steel engine guard and does not restrict bank-angle clearance.

name: Cylinder-head cover guard
description: The stainless-steel cylinder-head cover guard protects the cylinder head cover from scratches and flying stones. In addition, it is equipped with a large rubber buffer on the inside. Visually, the cylinder-head cover guard is perfectly matched to the design and lines of the boxer engine.

name: Enduro aluminium engine guard, silver
description: The robust and lightweight Enduro engine guard made of aluminium protects the lower part of the engine against stone chips and damage. Specially designed for off-road biking, the aluminium engine guard is 2.5 millimetres thick, considerably wider and longer than the standard engine guard. The special shape emphasises the off-road look of the motorcycle.

name: Engine protection bar, silver
description: The silver, robust engine protection bars, made of polished stainless steel, reliably protect the bike against damage without restricting the rider's freedom to lean the machine. The robust tube construction will even take hard knocks and prevent major fall damage off-road and on asphalt.

name: Headlight guard
description: The robust headlight guard prevents damage during off-road use. A quick coupling makes it easy to attach and detach. The component is made of impact-resistant and scratch-resistant plastic, making it ideal for off-road use.

name: Protective glass TFT display 6.5 inch
description: The protective glass reliably protects the 6.5-inch TFT display from dirt, flying stones and damage. The hardened glass has an anti-glare and anti-reflective surface, so that the TFT display can be read easily. With BMW Motorrad inscription.

name: Trophy aluminium engine guard
description: Extreme protection for ambitious off-road adventures. The Trophy aluminium enduro engine guard with reinforced side sections offers significantly increased safety for the engine, exhaust manifold and foot lever. The blasted and colourless anodised material withstands the harshest conditions and gives the bike a distinctive off-road look.

name: Vehicle cover
description: The Outdoor vehicle cover reliably protects your bike from rain, dirt and other environmental influences. The high-quality nylon cover is waterproof; it features ventilation openings and a viewing window for the number plate. Drawstrings and two metal eyelets guarantee secure attachment to the motorcycle.

name: 12 l tank bag, black
description: The 12 l black tank bag is an ideal companion on long and short tours with its loading capacity of up to 5 kg. The rucksack with its waterproof inner bag retains its shape, can be securely snapped onto the fuel tank without a strap and is both weather- and UV-resistant.

name: Backrest pad for aluminium topcase, black
description: Thanks to the backrest pad for the aluminium topcase, the passenger enjoys more comfort both on short trips and on long tours.

name: Luggage plate
description: The luggage plate made of sturdy plastic replaces the passenger seat and is the ideal basis for safely transporting larger items of luggage. With the integrated lashing eyes, the luggage can also be attached close to the vehicle’s centre of gravity.

name: Radiator cowl bag set, black, 4 l
description: The black radiator cowl bag provides practical stowage space for smaller objects that you need to have readily accessible on the go. The bag retains its shape, can be securely attached to the radiator cowl without a strap and is extra tear-resistant and durable, as well as being water-resistant, weather-resistant and dirt-repellent.

name: Radiator cowl bag, black, 4 l
description: The black radiator cowl bag provides practical stowage space for smaller objects that you need to have readily accessible on the go. The bag retains its shape, can be securely latched on to the radiator cowl and is extra tear-resistant and durable, as well as being water-resistant, weather-resistant and dirt-repellent.

name: Storage net for aluminium case
description: The custom-fit storage net allows you to store anything you need to have readily accessible in the aluminium case’s lid – from a rain jacket to tools. The elastic luggage net for smaller objects is simply attached to the provided hooks on the inside of the lid.

name: High, tinted windscreen
description: At higher speeds, the high windscreen with dark tinting noticeably relieves wind pressure from the upper body. This increases comfort and safety because the rider does not get tired so quickly. Another benefit of the windscreen is its excellent aerodynamics.

name: Wind deflectors, tinted
description: The tinted wind deflectors can be easily installed and effectively protect the hands from wind and weather. Their look accentuates the bike’s sporty impression.

name: Windscreen high
description: The high windscreen emphasises the bike’s sporty look. It combines excellent aerodynamics with excellent protection from wind and weather. The scratch-resistant coating on both sides increases durability. The "ACC" lettering rounds off the individual appearance.

name: Windscreen spoiler
description: The spoiler for the windscreen significantly boosts comfort on long trips. The improved wind protection reliably reduces wind buffeting on the helmet and in the neck area.

name: Extra socket
description: The extra socket enables the retrofitting of a 12V power socket for the supply of external power consumers. With the appropriate adapters, external navigation devices, music players or mobile phones, for example, can be supplied with power or charged.

name: Headlight guard
description: The headlight guard made of sturdy plastic effectively protects the headlight from damage when riding off-road, for instance from stone chips. The quick-release coupling makes installation simple.

name: Protective grille for LED additional headlight
description: The protective grille for the LED additional headlight protects the Enduro against damage, e.g. from stone chips. The protective grille made from black-painted steel is the perfect companion for off-road riding.

name: Trophy aluminium engine guard
description: Extreme protection for ambitious off-road adventures. The Trophy aluminium enduro engine guard with reinforced side sections offers significantly increased safety for the engine, exhaust manifold and foot lever. The blasted and colourless anodised material withstands the harshest conditions and gives the bike a distinctive off-road look.
